about.heading: About Us
about.body: Shri Manav Seva Sarvajanik Trust, Rajkot, and its affiliated organization, Shri Nakalank Seva Charitable Trust, Rajkot, have been providing continuous, free-of-cost services since 1987. Our hospital service board, Jaysiyaram Jaybalaji Jaygurudev Hospital Seva Mandal, provides pure, wholesome, and nutritious tea, milk, snacks, and meals three times a day, 365 days a year, for the relatives of patients at the Government-run Pandit Dindayal Civil Hospital, Padmakunvarba Gundawadi Hospital, and Rasul Khan Zanana Hospital in Rajkot. We also assist patients from all over Saurashtra with medicines, injections, medical equipment, and transportation. Our administrative costs are considered to be negligible, ensuring that every rupee you donate goes directly to those who need it most. We have been audited by a CA, file income tax returns on time, and have an 80G and CSR number. The Trust is supported by 200 to 250 dedicated volunteers, some of whom have been with us for decades or have family traditions of volunteering.

services.heading: Our Services
services.body_meals: We provide pure and nutritious breakfast, lunch, and dinner to patients and their relatives 365 days a year.
